ally include a mix 
of healthcare professionals 
and local trained volunteer 
mothers (peer supporters). 
These mothers have breastfed 
their own babies and have 
had some training in basic 
breastfeeding techniques. 
Some peer supporters will 
have had more in-depth 
training to help them support 
new mothers.
A map of all breastfeeding 
groups for Northern Ireland 
can be found on www.
breastfedbabies.org
To	find	out	what	is	available	in	
your area, talk to your midwife
